spec_data.Name: perl-Parse-CPAN-Distributions
spec_data.Description:
This Perl module provides the ability to index the distributions that are
currently listed on CPAN. This is done by parsing the index file find-ls.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:56:17 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provides an index for current CPAN distributions
